mcqQuestions.title: Time Complexity Analysis
mcqQuestions.explanation: The nested loops each run n times, resulting in n × n = n² operations, giving us O(n²) time complexity.

mcqQuestions.title: Data Structure Properties
mcqQuestions.description: Which data structure follows the Last In, First Out (LIFO) principle?
mcqQuestions.explanation: A stack follows the LIFO principle where the last element added is the first one to be removed.

mcqQuestions.title: Object-Oriented Programming
mcqQuestions.description: Which of the following is NOT a pillar of Object-Oriented Programming?
mcqQuestions.explanation: The four pillars of OOP are Encapsulation, Inheritance, Polymorphism, and Abstraction. Compilation is not a pillar of OOP.
